app.hero.cta: Open the website on your phone to get started!
app.hero.description: Green Goods measures, tracks, and rewards the impact on local hubs with a simple progressive web app.
app.hero.install.android: Tap the 3 dots menu button in the bottom right and press Add to Home Screen
app.hero.install.android.step2: Select Add to Home Screen or Install App.
app.hero.install.ios: Tap the share button and then press Add to Home Screen
app.hero.install.ios.step1: Tap the Share button in your browser bar.
app.hero.install.ios.step2: Scroll down and tap Add to Home Screen.
app.hero.install.other: Tap the menu button and press Add to Home Screen
app.hero.install.subtitle: Add to your home screen for the best experience.

app.profile.installDescriptionAndroid: Open in Chrome ‚Üí Menu ‚Üí Install app.
app.profile.help.faq.howToContact.answer: You can contact Green Goods by sending an email at greengoods@greenpill.builders.
app.profile.help.faq.howToContact.questi: How can I contact Green Goods?
app.profile.help.faq.howToGetInvolved.an: You can get involved with Green Goods by creating a garden assessment, joining the community, and sharing your knowledge and expertise.
app.profile.help.faq.howToGetInvolved.qu: How can I get involved with Green Goods?
app.profile.help.faq.howToLearnMore.answ: You can learn more about Green Goods by visiting our website, joining our Discord server, and following us on social media.
app.profile.help.faq.howToLearnMore.ques: How can I learn more about Green Goods?
app.profile.help.faq.howToBringImpactOnc: You can bring impact onchain by creating a garden assessment and submitting it to the Green Goods EAS.
How can I bring impact onchain?
app.profile.help.faq.whatIsImpact.answer: Impact is the variety of life on Earth. It includes all living organisms, from plants and animals to fungi and bacteria.
app.profile.help.faq.whatIsEAS.answer: EAS stands for Ethereum Attestation Service. It is a service that allows you to submit and verify data on the Ethereum blockchain.
app.profile.help.faq.whatIsEAS.question: What is EAS?
app.profile.help.faq.whatIsGreenGoods.an: Green Goods is a platform that allows you to bring impact onchain.
app.profile.help.faq.whoCanSubmitWork.an: Anyone can submit garden work to the Green Goods EAS. You do not need to be a professional gardener to participate.
Select a garden and action, add details and media. If you‚Äôre offline, the app saves your work locally and queues it. When you‚Äôre back online, media uploads and your work is attested onchain via EAS. Operators then review and approve or reject.
app.profile.help.faq.gardensAndOperators: Gardens are projects or locations where impact is measured. Operators manage a garden and review/approve submissions. Gardeners contribute work by submitting evidence of impact.
app.profile.help.faq.offlineSupport.ques: Can I use the app offline?
app.profile.help.faq.offlineSupport.answ: Yes. If you're offline, your work is saved locally on your device and will automatically sync when you're back online.
app.profile.help.faq.smartAccountAddress: What is my smart account address?
Your profile shows a smart account address used for submissions and approvals. You can also link your regular wallet (EOA).
app.profile.help.faq.dataStorage.answer: Work attestations are published onchain via EAS. Media and drafts are stored locally while offline and uploaded when you're back online.
app.profile.help.faq.duplicateHandling.a: Basic detection prevents obvious duplicates (for example, similar submissions within a short time window) to keep data clean.
